ROW.NAME: 无纳税人对应的电表编号报表

ROW.DATDSC: select flag,rownum rn,id,name,gds,eleqty,elepro,addr from ( select '' flag, id,name,gds,eleqty,elepro,addr from ( select usrid id,usrnam name,sum(nvl(eleqty,0)) eleqty, decode(max(gds),'',max(town)||'电力',max(gds)) gds, max(elepro) elepro,max(a.addr) addr from tax_eledata a,( select b.ID,b.name,b.flag,c.ammno from tax_company b,tax_cmpammno c where b.id=c.cmid ) b,tax_notinammno c where a.usrid=b.ammno(+) and a.usrid=c.ammno(+) [%GDSSTR] and a.yymm>=decode('[%YYMM1]','','1900-01','[%YYMM1]') and a.yymm<=decode('[%YYMM2]','','2900-01','[%YYMM2]') and a.typ like '[%TYP]%' and (a.usrid like '%[%CMID]%' or a.usrnam like '%[%CMID]%') and nvl(a.elepro,0) like '%[%ELE]%' and nvl(eleqty,0)>0 and b.ammno is null --and a.usrid not in (select ammno from tax_notinammno) [%FLGSTR] group by usrid,usrnam ) where eleqty between decode('[%ELEQTY1]','',0,'[%ELEQTY1]') AND decode('[%ELEQTY2]','',10000000000,'[%ELEQTY2]') order by eleqty desc ) t
select name from tax_company where id like '[%CORPID]'
select fxjb from FXJK_ITEM where flbh='0006'
